mutants.code:
def calculate_summary_price(n, k, c, d):
    s = sum(c)
    m = 1
    for i in range(k):
        d[i] -= 1
        s -= c[d[i]]
        m += c[d[i]] * s
        c[d[i]] = 0
    for i in range(n):
        m += c[i] * c[(i + 1) % n]
    return m

    s = sum(c)
    m = -1

        m += c[d[i]] * s
        c[d[i]] = 0
    for i in range(n):
        m += c[i] * c[(i + 1) % n]
    return m
